titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: <*> = no idea s2: <*> = "Lovor"? s3: <*> = marking under CHAMBAZ <*> = date markings over-written and difficult to discern

body.ab:
1940 CHAMBAZ M Marcel 10 rue Greuze, Paris XVI
1v, 1m 20 (present) dep 50 Sept 11 - extra dep 100 (refunded 100v dep Sept 17) Aug 21 Eggs, Beans + Crumpets Louder and Funnier Aug 23 23 War In the Air Aug 27 27 good Earth Aug 29 29 Sons Sept 11
Sept 11 dep Short Hist of Amer. Lit. Sept 17 11 Spirit of American Literature Sept 17 17 Sir Thomas Browns Eng Men of Let Oct 1 Renewed s sept 21st - October 21st 1940 1vs 20v pd Sept 17 Oct 1 Good-bye Mr Chips Oct 2 2 Case of the Substitute Case Oct 11 11 Case of the Howling Dog Oct 14 14 Adventures of Bindle Oct 26 26 Nov 14 Renewed Oct 21. Nov 21st 1940 s 20 pd Oct 26 Nov. 14 Hot Water Nov 19 Nov 19 grapes of Wrath Dec 18 Renewed Nov 21. Dec 21 1940 S 20 Dec 18 Collected Poems of Rup Brooke Jan 9 Jan 9 <*> p.g. Feb 25 Feb 28 Renewed Jan 21st - subsc expired Jan 21 pd Feb 28 40 2 mos 1 v s
Renewed Jan 21st - March 21 1941 40 to March 21 pd Feb 28 1941 July Feb 28 Lord Emsworth & Others Mar 18 Mar 18 Walls' Short Stories Mar 24 Renewed March 21 - April 21 1941 1m1v 20 Mar 24 P Smith, journalist april 18 april 18 Strangest Places april 23 Renewed april 21st - May 21st 1941 1m s 20 april 23 From Bed to Worst apr 29 29 My 10 years in a quandary May 26 subsc expired p.c. May 21 S. ren May 21 - June 21. 1941. 1m1v. s 20 May 26 Sea Lady July 2 July 2 Fifty seven Humourous Tales July 4 Renewed June 21 - July 21 1941 20 (pd July 2) July 4 Intelligent Man's View of Europe July 8 4 Guide to Modern Politics _ 8 4 Outline History of the World since 1914 _8 8 Modern Tales of <*> July 28 Sub. renewed July 21 - Sept. 21 1941 40 pd.
